mapper.select: SELECT TABLENAME, COLUMNNAME, OBJECTID FROM ( SELECT ONE_ID AS OBJECTID, 'AND_ONE' AS TABLENAME, 'ONE_ID' AS COLUMNNAME, ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY ONE_TIME DESC) AS ROW_NUM FROM AND_ONE AO WHERE (ONE_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR ONE_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR ONE_HASHTAG LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%') UNION SELECT S_ID AS OBJECTID, 'SHOP' AS TABLENAME, 'S_ID' AS COLUMNNAME, ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY S_SCORE DESC) AS ROW_NUM FROM SHOP S WHERE (S_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR S_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR S_HASHTAG LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%') UNION SELECT C_ID AS OBJECTID, 'CLUB' AS TABLENAME, 'C_ID' AS COLUMNNAME, ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY C_OPENINGDATE DESC) AS ROW_NUM FROM CLUB C WHERE (C_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR C_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR C_HASHTAG LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%') UNION SELECT N_ID AS OBJECTID, 'NOTICE' AS TABLENAME, 'N_ID' AS COLUMNNAME, ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY N_DATE DESC) AS ROW_NUM FROM NOTICE N WHERE (N_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR N_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%') UNION SELECT CA_ID AS OBJECTID, 'C_ARTICLE' AS TABLENAME, 'CA_ID' AS COLUMNNAME, ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY CA_DATE DESC) AS ROW_NUM FROM C_ARTICLE CA WHERE (CA_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%') ) WHERE ROW_NUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3

SELECT 'AND_ONE' AS TABLENAME, COUNT(*) AS RESULTCOUNT FROM AND_ONE AO WHERE (ONE_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR ONE_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR ONE_HASHTAG LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%') GROUP BY 'AND_ONE' UNION SELECT 'SHOP' AS TABLENAME, COUNT(*) AS RESULTCOUNT FROM SHOP S WHERE (S_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR S_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR S_HASHTAG LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%') GROUP BY 'SHOP' UNION SELECT 'CLUB' AS TABLENAME, COUNT(*) AS RESULTCOUNT FROM CLUB C WHERE (C_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR C_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR C_HASHTAG LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%') GROUP BY 'CLUB' UNION SELECT 'NOTICE' AS TABLENAME, COUNT(*) AS RESULTCOUNT FROM NOTICE N WHERE (N_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR N_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%') GROUP BY 'NOTICE' UNION SELECT 'C_ARTICLE' AS TABLENAME, COUNT(*) AS RESULTCOUNT FROM C_ARTICLE CA WHERE (CA_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%') GROUP BY 'C_ARTICLE'
